alert.note: Alert for Madison River Valley; Missouri Headwaters (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 04 at 8:36PM MST until March 06 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches. * WHERE...Madison River Valley and Missouri Headwaters. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will decrease through midnight or so, but it will increase again later tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
